protein.specific_function: Kinase involved in a signal transduction pathway that is activated by changes in the osmolarity of the extracellular environment, by cytokines, or by environmental stress. Phosphorylates preferentially transcription factor ATF2

go_class.description: receptor signaling protein serine/threonine kinase activity
